Name: Get-NetQosPolicy
Synopsis: Retrieves network Quality of Service (QoS) policies.

Name: New-NetQosPolicy
Synopsis: Creates a new network Quality of Service (QoS) policy.

Name: Remove-NetQosPolicy
Synopsis: Removes a network Quality of Service (QoS) policy.

Name: Set-NetQosPolicy
Synopsis: Updates the Quality of Service (QoS) policy settings.
